<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82003</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82003</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7694</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="es">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="ga">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da Vinci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">DA Vinci</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will be tested on their knowledge of Da Vinci in a fun way.</string>
            <string language="es">Se comprobará el conocimiento de los alumnos sobre Da Vinci de una forma divertida.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfar na daltaí ar a n-eolas faoi Da Vinci ar bhealach spóirtiúil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen werden auf ihrem Wissen von Da Vinci in 
einer Spaßmethode geprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des pupilles seront testées sur leur 
connaissance de Da Vinci d'une voie d'amusement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas serão testadas em seu conhecimento de
Da Vinci em uma maneira do divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille saranno esaminate sulla loro 
conoscenza di Da Vinci in un modo di divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα εξεταστούν στη γνώση DA τους Vinci 
με έναν τρόπο διασκέδασης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7694</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>

        <classification>
